title:
I have wanted to contact the paper for some time to äóìinvestigateäó the health nuisance of George the duck at the NE branch of the NH County Public Library.

My family and I have been going to the NE Library for the 10 years it has been open, always from the same side entrance.

Now that side entrance is an exercise in how to avoid stepping in excrement.  It is so disgusting and of course I donäó»t want my children stepping in it.



George stopped being endearing long ago when the sidewalk became the target.

Shouldnäó»t the Library or the county be expected to clean and disinfect this public area?
